thread.section_title: Hotel Brady Gare de L'Est - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very pleasant staff, close to 2 metro stations
thread.title_full: Very pleasant staff, close to 2 metro stations - Review of Hotel Brady Gare de L'Est, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MrP6552
title: Very pleasant staff, close to 2 metro stations
text:
All 3 members of the staff I met were very helpful. They was always willing to go the extra mile to get you the information you needed and were always willing to try and assist.
The room isn't very big, and the hotel itself is a very short walk from two metro/subway stations. Locally there are plenty of food options, found a couple of shisha spots, and even some trendy fashion shops amongst all the other local shops.
Very good location for commuting to wherever you want to go, and if you ever need any extra help, the staff always very helpful.
